23 May 2016

More New MVPs

by Jim McKeeth

I’ve got another large group of MVPs that have just signed up. They will appear in the MVP directory soon, but until then you can discover more about them here:

  • Joachim Dürr - Germany
  • Malcolm Groves - Australia
  • Oren Aviram - Isreal
  • Samer ASSIL - Turkey
  • Andrew Efimov - Russia
  • David Hoyle - United Kingdom
  • Rodrigo Mourão - Brazil
  • Tomás Chávez Jiménez - Mexico
  • Evgeny Parkhomenko - Russia
  • Thierry LABORDE - France

For those of you keeping count, that puts the total number of MVPs over 100.
